client.gui.canvas.tools

Class FreehandTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.gui.canvas.tools.FreehandTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tool

    public class FreehandTool
extends java.lang.Object
implements Tool
    Implements Tool. This is used when the user selects the freehand tool. This is associated with the draw controller.
    Author:
    rcha
